answers.author: Diane Archer
answers.text:
Some of the metrics I have seen are % of unplanned downtime, % of productive hours, % of preventive maintenance completed on time, hourly rate

author: Brian Knudsen
text:
Are there examples of performance metrics for fleet maintenance?  What standards do city's adhere to with regards to fleet maintenance, including maintenance of emergency service vehicles?
Thanks
title: Performance Metrics for Fleet Maintenance
